Caption: Dr. S. Bhagavantam is shown the lab facilities by Prof. S. Sampath (Deputy Director)and Prof. A. Ramachandran (Director)
Description: The chief guest at IIT Madrasâ€™s sixth convocation was Dr. S. Bhagavantam, Scientific Advisor to the Ministry of Defence, Government of India. On the day of the event, upon reaching the campus, Dr. S. Bhagavantam was received by Prof. A. Ramachandran, Director of the Institute and Mr. C. V. Sethunathan, Registrar. After the event (possibly), the chief guest was shown around the Institute and was invited to view the labs and workshop facilities. In the image, Dr. S. Bhagavantam examines the equipment of the Heat Transfer & Thermal Power Laboratory. From left: Prof. S. Sampath (Deputy Director), Dr V. C. Venkatesh (possibly), Dr. S. Bhagvantam and Prof. A. Ramachandran (Director)
